title: Fact Checker video: Donald Trump’s most outrageous Four-Pinocchio claims
subtitle: Donald Trump has made quite a few false statements during his rise to the top of the Republican field. This Fact Checker video takes a look at Trump's five biggest whoppers.
author: www.washingtonpost.com
